name: Chickenfarm
overview: At the first screen after loading, you can also set the game level and the number of players. The number of players with function key 'f1', the game level with 'f3'. When you're done, press 'FIRE'. The game scene appears on the screen, on the right the house with a barrel in front of it, on the left the chicken coop and at the top the connecting line in which the eggs are rolling. Imagine. You are the owner of the chicken farm. Your task is to catch the eggs that fall and catch them with the basket. In your basket, however, there is only room for a maximum of 5 eggs. So you have to empty it into the barrel on the right at the latest when it contains 5 eggs. To do this, run to the right as far as you can and also press the 'FIRE button. Now the eggs are emptied. After that, the game continues as before. Be fast and wise or the yolk will be on you! The game was originally published in 1984 in the German magazine, Homecomputer 1984/07. It was re-released in 1986 in English by Robtek Ltd. in their King Size compilation.
